panel.title: Users Logged into the Platform Today

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_index_audit_user_login_tracker_sh_kv_store_lookup | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | eval Days_Latest_Access = round((now() - Latest_Access) / 86400 ) | where Days_Latest_Access=0 | `strftime_format(Latest_Access)` | `get_identity_info(User)` | eval shcluster_label = if(isnull(shcluster_label), Splunk_Instance, shcluster_label) | `get_geo_info(emp_city,emp_region1,emp_country)` | `get_iplocation_info2(Login_Source)` | stats Last(*) as * by User | table User emp_name emp_title shcluster_label Login_Source Latest_Access emp_lob1 emp_lob2 emp_dep emp_location emp_city emp_region1 emp_country | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_index_audit_user_login_tracker_sh_kv_store_lookup | eval Days_Latest_Access = round((now() - Latest_Access) / 86400 ) | where Days_Latest_Access = 0 | stats count

panel.title: Number of Users Logged into the Platform over time In the last 30 days

search.query: index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name=splunk_audit_user_login_idx_summary_tracker earliest=-30d@d | fields _time User Splunk_Instance Login_Source OS_Name OS_Version Browser_Name Browser_Version | timechart span=1d Dc(User) As Num_Users

panel.title: Users not logging into the platform in more than ($Days_Latest_Access_1$) Days

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_identities_kv_store_lookup | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_splunk_roles_info(shcluster_label,splunk_role_map)` | stats Values(email) As email Values(emp_dep) As emp_dep Values(emp_lob) As emp_lob Values(emp_name) As emp_name Values(emp_status) As emp_status Values(emp_title) As emp_title Values(emp_type) As emp_type Values(endDate) As endDate Values(emp_manager) As emp_manager By shcluster_label identity | lookup splunk_index_audit_user_login_tracker_sh_kv_store_lookup User AS identity OUTPUTNEW Latest_Access Splunk_Instance Login_Source | eval time_diff=now()-Latest_Access | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_1$*24*60*60 | where time_diff > Days_Latest_Access AND emp_type!="Service" AND identity!="admin" | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | `strftime_format(Latest_Access)` | rename time_diff As "Time Since Latest Login" | table identity Latest_Access shcluster_label "Time Since Latest Login" emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_identities_kv_store_lookup | `get_instance_roles(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_splunk_roles_info(shcluster_label,splunk_role_map)` | stats Values(email) As email Values(emp_dep) As emp_dep Values(emp_lob) As emp_lob Values(emp_name) As emp_name Values(emp_status) As emp_status Values(emp_title) As emp_title Values(emp_type) As emp_type Values(endDate) As endDate Values(emp_manager) As emp_manager By shcluster_label identity | lookup splunk_index_audit_user_login_tracker_sh_kv_store_lookup User AS identity OUTPUTNEW Latest_Access Splunk_Instance Login_Source | eval time_diff=now()-Latest_Access | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_1$*24*60*60 | where time_diff > Days_Latest_Access AND emp_type!="Service" AND identity!="admin" | stats count

panel.title: Users Accessing the platform in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_2$) Days

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count latest(_time) As _time FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance IN (*$exclusions_1$*) earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_2$d BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As identity | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,identity)` | `get_identity_info(identity)` | search NOT emp_type IN (service) | `fillnull_identity_info` | `strftime_format(_time)` | table identity _time shcluster_label emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count latest(_time) As _time FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance IN (*$exclusions_1$*) earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_2$d BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As identity | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,identity)` | `get_identity_info(identity)` | search NOT emp_type IN (service) | stats dc(identity)

panel.title: Users Accessing and leveraging the platform in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_3$) Days

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance IN (*$exclusions_2$*) earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_3$d BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | search NOT emp_type IN (service) | `fillnull_identity_info` | table shcluster_label user emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance IN (*$exclusions_2$*) earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_3$d BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | search NOT emp_type IN (service) | stats dc(user)

panel.title: Platform Dashboards

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | eval Splunk_Tier = case ( match(label, "IDX"), "Indexer", match(label, "SH"), "Search Head", match(label, "UF"), "Forwarder", true(), "Other") | table shcluster_label Splunk_Tier label description updated | `strftime_format(updated)` | `rename_dashboards_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | stats count

panel.title: Dashboard Accessed in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_4$) Days

search.query: index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_web_access_idx_summary_tracker earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_4$d App!="global_monitoring_console" NOT Dashboard_Name IN ($exclusions_3$) | fields _time User Splunk_Instance App OS_Name avg_spent Dashboard_Name Latest_Access | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label, User)` | stats Dc(User) As Num_Users Values(emp_lob) As emp_lob1 Values(emp_dep) As emp_dep Latest(_time) As _time By shcluster_label App Dashboard_Name | table shcluster_label App Dashboard_Name _time emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status Num_Users | `strftime_format(_time)` | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name=splunk_internal_web_access_idx_summary_tracker earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_4$d App!="global_monitoring_console" NOT title IN ($exclusions_3$) | fields _time User Splunk_Instance App OS_Name avg_spent Dashboard_Name Latest_Access | `get_shcluster_label(Splunk_Instance)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label, User)` | stats Dc(Dashboard_Name)

panel.title: New Dashboards Created or Updated in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_5$) Days

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | eval time_diff=now()-updated | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_5$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | `strftime_format(updated)` | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label, author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | table shcluster_label label title updated app sharing author emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status time_diff acl_perms_read acl_perms_write description | rename time_diff As "Time Since Latest Login" | `rename_dashboards_fields` | `rename_common_fields` | `rename_identity_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | eval time_diff=now()-updated | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_5$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | stats Dc(title)

panel.title: Platform Scheduled Reports/Alerts

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup | where is_scheduled=1 AND disabled=0 | fields shcluster_label app savedsearch_name description updated cron_schedule Run_Time scheduled_times next_scheduled_time Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time schedule_window allow_skew schedule_priority | stats values(scheduled_times) as scheduled_times values(next_scheduled_time) as next_scheduled_time last(*) as * by shcluster_label app savedsearch_name | `strftime_format(updated)` | eval scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,0,3) ,scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,1,3) , TimeZone=strftime(strptime(next_scheduled_time,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"), "%Y%m%d%H%M%S") + " -500" , EST_Time=strftime(strptime(TimeZone,"%Y%m%d%H%M%S %Z"),"%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S %Z") | `get_saved_searches_usage(shcluster_label,app,savedsearch_name)` | eval "Job Class" = case ( match(savedsearch_name, "_tracker$"), "Tracking Jobs", match(savedsearch_name, "_lookup_gen"), "Lookup Gen Jobs", true(), "Other") | table shcluster_label savedsearch_name description updated cron_schedule Run_Time scheduled_times next_scheduled_time Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time schedule_window allow_skew schedule_priority | `strftime_format(scheduled_times)` | `strftime_format(next_scheduled_time)` | `rename_saved_searches_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup | where is_scheduled=1 AND disabled=0 | stats count

panel.title: Platform Lookups

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_kv_store_lookup | `strftime_format(updated)` | eval Index="GMC" | lookup splunk_gmc_kb_csv_lookup Index Field_Name As Lookup OUTPUTNEW Field_Description | rename Field_Description As Description | table shcluster_label Lookup Type Description Filename Collection updated | `rename_lookup_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_kv_store_lookup | stats count

panel.title: New Scheduled Jobs Created or Updated in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_5$) Days

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup | where is_scheduled=1 AND disabled=0 | eval time_diff=now()-updated | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_5$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | fields shcluster_label app savedsearch_name description updated cron_schedule Run_Time scheduled_times next_scheduled_time Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time schedule_window allow_skew schedule_priority | stats values(scheduled_times) as scheduled_times values(next_scheduled_time) as next_scheduled_time last(*) as * by shcluster_label app savedsearch_name | `strftime_format(updated)` | eval scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,0,3) ,scheduled_times=mvindex(scheduled_times,1,3) , TimeZone=strftime(strptime(next_scheduled_time,"%m/%d/%Y %H:%M:%S"), "%Y%m%d%H%M%S") + " -500" , EST_Time=strftime(strptime(TimeZone,"%Y%m%d%H%M%S %Z"),"%Y/%m/%d %H:%M:%S %Z") | `get_saved_searches_usage(shcluster_label,app,savedsearch_name)` | eval "Job Class" = case ( match(savedsearch_name, "_tracker$"), "Tracking Jobs", match(savedsearch_name, "_lookup_gen"), "Lookup Gen Jobs", true(), "Other") | table shcluster_label savedsearch_name description updated cron_schedule Run_Time scheduled_times next_scheduled_time Scheduled_Time Dispatch_Time schedule_window allow_skew schedule_priority | `strftime_format(scheduled_times)` | `strftime_format(next_scheduled_time)` | `rename_saved_searches_fields`

panel.title: Total

search.query: | inputlookup splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_kv_store_lookup | where is_scheduled=1 AND disabled=0 | eval time_diff=now()-updated | eval Days_Latest_Access=$Days_Latest_Access_5$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | stats count

panel.title: Top 10 Usage by Splunk SH Cluster/Instance by LOB

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | top 10 emp_lob by shcluster_label | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields`

panel.title: Top 10 Usage by Splunk SH Cluster/Instance by Department

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage AND index=_introspection AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.search_type3 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.provenance = "UI:*" NOT Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 IN (admin, splunk-system-user) BY host Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage.user3 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Introspection_Search_Usage)` | rename user3 As user | `get_shcluster_info(host)` | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,user)` | `get_identity_info(user)` | top 10 emp_dep by shcluster_label | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields`

panel.title: Knowledge Object Creation by LOB/Department (ongoing development activities)

search.query: | from lookup:splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_kv_store_lookup | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `fillnull_identity_info` | `strftime_format(updated)` | stats count by emp_lob | `rename_identity_fields`

panel.title: Splunk Knowledge Objects that has been created or updated in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_7$) Days

search.query: index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name IN (splunk_rest_admin_eventtypes_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_admin_lookup_table_files_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_configs_conf_props_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_macros_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_models_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_calcfields_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_extractions_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_fieldaliases_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_props_lookups_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_transforms_extractions_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_data_ui_views_sh_summary_data, splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data) NOT author IN (system, admin, splunk-system-user) updated=* earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_7$d | eval time_diff = now() - updated | eval Days_Latest_Access = $Days_Latest_Access_7$*24*60*60 | where time_diff < Days_Latest_Access | `get_ko_type` | eval title = case ( search_name="splunk_rest_admin_lookup_table_files_sh_summary_data", Filename, search_name="splunk_rest_admin_transforms_lookup_sh_summary_data", Lookup, search_name="splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data", savedsearch_name, search_name="splunk_rest_data_props_calcfields_sh_summary_data", name, match(search_name, "splunk_rest_data_props_fieldaliases_sh_summary_data|splunk_rest_data_props_extractions_sh_summary_data|splunk_rest_data_props_lookups_sh_summary_data"), attribute, true(), title) | stats Latest(updated) As updated Latest(time_diff) As time_diff earliest(sharing) AS start_share latest(sharing) AS end_share dc(sharing) AS share_states count by shcluster_label Knowledge_Object_Type app author title | eval sharing=end_share, sharing_change=if(share_states>1, "From ". start_share ." to ". end_share, "No change"), sharing_change=if(start_share=end_share, "No change", sharing_change) | `get_identity_info(shcluster_label,author)` | `get_identity_info(author)` | `strftime_format(updated)` | `gmc_convert_runtime(time_diff)` | table shcluster_label Knowledge_Object_Type title app sharing sharing_change author emp_name emp_title emp_dep emp_lob1 emp_type emp_status updated time_diff | `rename_identity_fields` | `rename_common_fields` | rename Knowledge_Object_Type As "Knowledge Object Type", title As "Knowledge Object Name" app As App updated As "Knowledge Object Update Time" time_diff As "Updated in the last" author As User, sharing_change AS "Sharing Change"

panel.title: Count of SHC Scheduler Executions Over Time by Status (Excludes Data Models & Continuous Jobs)

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE `tstats_gmc_internal` FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler index=_internal AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.info2 IN (success, skipped, continued, delegated_remote_completion) AND Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_type2 != "*acceleration" earliest=-1d@d latest=-0d@d BY _time Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler.search_id2 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Internal_Scheduler)` | rename search_id2 As search_id , info AS status | fields _time host app concurrency_category concurrency_context concurrency_limit dispatch_time priority reason result_count total_run_time savedsearch_id savedsearch_name scheduled_time search_id search_type skipped_count status user window_time alert_actions event_message | timechart span=$span$ count(eval(status=="delegated_remote_completion")) AS SHC_COMP_EXEC count(eval(status=="skipped")) AS Skipped_EXEC count(eval(status=="delegated_remote_completion" OR status=="skipped")) AS SHC_TOT_EXEC | eval Skip_Ratio = round ( ( Skipped_EXEC / SHC_TOT_EXEC ) * 100, 0) | fields - SHC_TOT_EXEC

panel.title: Ad-Hoc Searches By Status in the last 24 Hours

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Audit_Search index=_audit AND Search_Activity.Audit_Search.search_type1 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Audit_Search.info1!="granted" AND earliest=-24h@h BY Search_Activity.Audit_Search.search_id1 Search_Activity.Audit_Search.info1 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Audit_Search)` | stats count by info1 | rename info1 As Status

panel.title: Ad-Hoc Searches By Status in the last 24 Hours with Number of Users

search.query: | tstats SUMMARIESONLY=TRUE ALLOW_OLD_SUMMARIES=FALSE count FROM DATAMODEL=GMC WHERE nodename=Search_Activity.Audit_Search index=_audit AND Search_Activity.Audit_Search.search_type1 = "adhoc" AND Search_Activity.Audit_Search.info1!="granted" AND earliest=-24h@h BY Search_Activity.Audit_Search.search_id1 Search_Activity.Audit_Search.user1 Search_Activity.Audit_Search.info1 | `gmc_drop_dm_object_name(Search_Activity.Audit_Search)` | stats count As Num_Searches dc(user1) as Num_Users by info1

panel.title: Number of Scheduled Jobs/Alerts in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_5$) Days

search.query: index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name="splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data" is_scheduled=1 disabled=0 NOT app IN ("*global_monitoring_console","splunk_instance_monitoring","skynet-rest","cloud-monitoring-console-summarizer") earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_9$d@d | where shcluster_label!="No-shcluster_label" | fields _time shcluster_label app savedsearch_name savedsearch_type author disabled is_scheduled sharing cron_schedule schedule_priority schedule_window updated allow_skew | bin _time span=1d | stats count BY _time shcluster_label app author sharing savedsearch_name | stats count As Num_Scheduled_Jobs by _time

panel.title: Number of Scheduled Jobs/Alerts in the last ($Days_Latest_Access_5$) Days By Employee Department

search.query: index=`gmc_setup_summary_index` search_name="splunk_rest_saved_searches_sh_summary_data" is_scheduled=1 disabled=0 NOT app IN ("*global_monitoring_console","splunk_instance_monitoring","skynet-rest","cloud-monitoring-console-summarizer") earliest=-$Days_Latest_Access_15$d@d | fields _time shcluster_label app savedsearch_name savedsearch_type author sharing updated | `get_identity_info(author)` | fillnull value="Other" $gmc_identity$ | bin _time span=1d | stats count BY _time shcluster_label app sharing author $gmc_identity$ savedsearch_name | timechart useother=f usenull=f fixedrange=false count by $gmc_identity$
| noop
